attributes.action: British Teenagers to do Mandatory National Service for 2 Years
attributes.additional_details: The majority of countries insist that when a male turns 18 it is mandatory for them to do a minimum of 2 years National Service.  I think that in light of recent events, this should be imposed in this country to get our teenagers respecting themselves, their country and the people around them and to bring some order to our unruly streets.  If you agree, please sign.....
